Program_Policies: A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).; The list of department-approved supporting courses can be found at: https://www.bellisario.psu.edu/departments/film-production-media-studies/film-studies-minor-supporting-courses.
